source_setting.source: SELECT p.patent_id as patent_number, p.title, p.type, p.country, p.date, p.year, p.abstract, p.kind, cpc.subgroup_id as first_cpc_subgroup_id FROM PatentsView_20210330.patent as p join (select patent_id, subgroup_id from PatentsView_20210330.cpc_current where sequence=0) as cpc on p.patent_id = cpc.patent_id where year(p.date)=2020 and month(p.date)>=9 order by p.patent_id limit {limit} offset {offset};
source_setting.count_source: SELECT count(1) FROM PatentsView_20210330.patent as p where year(p.date)=2020 and month(p.date)>=9;
